content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for considering my apartment. I'm open to discussing the rental price with you, but I'm also looking to maximize my gains. So, what price are you willing to pay for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to know if there are any additional fees or charges that I should be aware of. I'm looking for the lowest possible price, but I don't want to end up paying more than I can afford.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I understand your concern, Ryanah. I want to be transparent with you about any additional fees or charges that you should be aware of. The monthly rental price for the apartment is 750 Euros, but please note that there will be a security deposit of 300 Euros due upon signing the lease agreement. Additionally, there may be some minor expenses for utilities like electricity and water, which I will discuss with you in more detail once you have signed the lease agreement. If you agree to the rental price and the additional fees, I can arrange for the lease agreement to be prepared for you to sign.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month and the security deposit of 300 Euros. I'm also willing to discuss the utilities expenses with you. What's next?
```
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Great, Ryanah! I'm glad we were able to reach an agreement on the rental price and security deposit. As for the utilities expenses, I will discuss them with you in more detail once we sign the lease agreement. You can expect to pay around 50-70 Euros per month for electricity and water, depending on your usage. Once you have signed the lease agreement, I will arrange for you to meet with the utility companies to set up your accounts. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask. We can set up a meeting to go over the lease agreement and finalize the details.
name: Heinrich Heine
